inclusion.criterion: poor efficacy or tolerance to medical therapy for BPH
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: transrectal ultrasound prostate volume between 30 and 120 ml
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ability to express written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: indwelling bladder catheter or clean intermittent catheterization
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: severe detrusor hypocontractility (BCI <50) or detrusorial acontractility
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: not replaceable anticoagulant or antiplatelet drugs for severe cardiological comorbidity
exclusion.label: unknown
